verses.roman:
kibā raghunandana--pitā, tumi--tāra tanaya?
niścaya kariyā kaha, yāuka saṁśaya'

synonyms: kibā—or; raghunandana—Raghunandana; pitā—father; tumi—you; tāra—his; tanaya—son; niścaya kariyā—making certain; kaha—just speak; yāuka saṁśaya—let My doubts be dissipated.
translation: "Or is Śrīla Raghunandana your father whereas you are his son? Please let Me know the facts so that My doubts will go away."
